21#include "mpc-impl.h"
22
23/* returns ceil(log(d)/log(2)) if d > 0 */
24/* Don't use count_leading_zeros since it is in longlong.h */
25mpfr_prec_t
26mpc_ceil_log2 (mpfr_prec_t d)
27{
28 mpfr_prec_t exp;
29
30 for (exp = 0; d > 1; d = (d + 1) / 2)
31 exp++;
32 return exp;
33}
34
